GSP27motik_2u:1: ātmīyaś cānyadīyaś ca jaya]ty atibalas tayoḥ // Mo_2,5.5 //
GSP27motik_2u:5: "dvau puruṣārthau huḍāv iva yudhyete" yuddhaṃ kurutaḥ |
GSP27motik_2u:14: anarthaḥ prāpyate yatra śāstritād api pauruṣāt /

GSP27motik_2u:16: "yatra" puruṣeṇa "śāstritād api pauruṣāt anarthaḥ prāpyate tatra anarthakam" anarthotpādakaṃ {3} "svapauruṣam" aśāstrīyaṃ pauruṣaṃ |
GSP27motik_2u:18: tanmadhye praviṣṭād balavataḥ svapauruṣād evāsau anartha utpanna iti "jñeyam" iti bhāvaḥ |

GSP27motik_2u:20: dvayoḥ pauruṣayoś ca sarvatra sandhir asti asahāyasyaikakasyotthānāsaṃbhavāt || MoT_2,5.6
GSP27motik_2u:24: puruṣasya kartavyaṃ darśayati paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya dantair dantān vicūrṇayan /
GSP27motik_2u:25: śubhenāśubham udyuktaḥ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ jayet // Mo_2,5.7 //

GSP27motik_2u:33: pratyakṣeṇa tu pauruṣasyaiva niyojane sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam ity etad abhipretya "pratyakṣād adhikā na se"ty uktam || MoT_2,5.8 ||

GSP27motik_2u:41: asaddaivam adhaḥ kṛtvā nityam udyuktayā dhiyā /

GSP27motik_2u:61: vraṇe kīṭa ivāsvādya vayaḥ kāryaṃ na bhasmasāt // Mo_2,5.15 //

GSP27motik_2u:113: guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthaḥ saṃprāpyate hi taiḥ // Mo_2,5.26 //

GSP27motik_2u:156: śrīvālmīkiḥ sargāntaślokena bharadvājaṃ prati tatratyaṃ dināvasānaṃ kathayati ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /

GSP27motik_2u:175: prabhāte {1} śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ śrīrāmaṃ prati pūrvasargoktavastuphalitaṃ kathayati tasmāt prākpauruṣaṃ daivaṃ nānyat {2} tat projjhya dūrataḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:193: yathā yathā prayatnaḥ syād bhaved āśu phalaṃ tathā /

GSP27motik_2u:199: duḥkhād yathā duḥkhakāle hā kaṣṭam iti kathyate /

GSP27motik_2u:4330: ekāṃśenāpi kāryasya siddhatvān na ko 'pīty arthaḥ || MoT_2,19.1 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4348: yayā kayācid yuktyāśu mahāvākyārtham āśrayet // Mo_2,19.3 //
GSP27motik_2u:4351: śāntiḥ śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavān bhavet /
GSP27motik_2u:4352: bhoktavya odanaḥ prāptaḥ kiṃ tatsiddhivikalpitaiḥ // Mo_2,19.4 //
GSP27motik_2u:4354: "siddhivikalpitaiḥ" katham etat sampannam iti vikalpaiḥ || MoT_2,19.4 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4367: "śāstrārthaś" ca tābhyāṃ śālate iti tādṛśena || MoT_2,19.7 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4370: tāvad vicārayet prājño yāvad viśrāntim ātmani /
GSP27motik_2u:4391: jīvato 'jīvataś caiva gṛhasthasyātha vā yateḥ // Mo_2,19.10 //
GSP27motik_2u:4393: nirmandara ivāṃbhodhiḥ sa tiṣṭhati yathāsthitam // Mo_2,19.11 //
GSP27motik_2u:4402: boddhavyā bodhyabodhāya na stheyaṃ codyacañcunā // Mo_2,19.12 //
GSP27motik_2u:4409: yayā kayācid yuktyāśu boddhavyaṃ bodhyam eva te /
GSP27motik_2u:4410: muktaye tan na paśyanti vyākulāś codyacañcavaḥ // Mo_2,19.13 //
GSP27motik_2u:4419: codyacañcoḥ lakṣaṇaṃ kathayati hṛdaye saṃvidākāśe viśrānte 'nubhavātmani /
GSP27motik_2u:4420: vastuny anarthaṃ yaḥ praṣṭā codyacañcuḥ sa ucyate // Mo_2,19.14 //
GSP27motik_2u:4427: svānubhavāviṣṭe 'pi vastuni yaḥ punaḥ punaḥ codyān utpādayati saḥ codyacañcur iti bhāvaḥ ||
GSP27motik_2u:4431: bodhaṃ malinayaty antar mukhaṃ sarpa ivāmalam // Mo_2,19.15 //
GSP27motik_2u:4442: upadeśe upayogyānāṃ pramāṇāṃ nirṇayaṃ prastauti sarvapramāṇasattānāṃ padam abdhir apām iva
GSP27motik_2u:4443: pramāṇam ekam eveha pratyakṣaṃ rāma tac chṛṇu // Mo_2,19.16 //
GSP27motik_2u:4449: na hi anumānādayaḥ pratyakṣaṃ vinā sthātuṃ śaknuvanti |
GSP27motik_2u:4455: pratyakṣam eva kathayati sarvārthasāram adhyakṣaṃ vedanaṃ vidur uttamāḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4456: nūnaṃ tat prati yat siddhaṃ tat pratyakṣam udāhṛtam // Mo_2,19.17 //
GSP27motik_2u:4466: akṣaṃ prati siddhaṃ pratyakṣam iti vyutpatteḥ |
GSP27motik_2u:4470: pratyakṣam iti nāmeha kṛtaṃ jīvaḥ sa eva ca // Mo_2,19.18 //
GSP27motik_2u:4479: vedanasyaiva vedanaṃ prati siddhatvād anyasya sarvasya tasmiṃl layāsādanāt "sa eva jīvaḥ"
GSP27motik_2u:4481: vedanād anyasya śarīrādeḥ pāṣāṇatulyatvena jīvatvāyogāt anubhūtipratipattyoḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvakṛto bhedo jñeyaḥ || MoT_2,19.18 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4482: padārthānām etadrūpatvam eva kathayati sa eva saṃvit sa punar ahaṃtāpratyayātmakaḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4483: sa yayodeti saṃvittyā sā padārtha iti smṛtā // Mo_2,19.19 //
GSP27motik_2u:4495: na hi padārthasya saṃvittivyatirekeṇa pṛthaksvarūpam asti |
GSP27motik_2u:4497: na hi saṃvittiṃ vinā sat sat bhavati ||
GSP27motik_2u:4502: padārthānāṃ jagattvaṃ kathayati sa saṃkalpavikalpādyaiḥ kṛtanānākramo bhramaiḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4503: jagattayā sphuraty ambu taraṅgāditayā yathā // Mo_2,19.20 //
GSP27motik_2u:4513: nanu śuddhasya vedanasya katham evaṃrūpatā sampannety |
GSP27motik_2u:4514: atrāha prāg akāraṇam evāśu sargādau sargalīlayā /
GSP27motik_2u:4515: sphuritvā kāraṇībhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svayam ātmani // Mo_2,19.21 //
GSP27motik_2u:4525: na ca svātantryakṛte katham iti paryanuyogaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,19.21
GSP27motik_2u:4528: nanu vedanarūpasya jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ kiṃrūpam astīty |
GSP27motik_2u:4529: atrāha kāraṇatvaṃ vicāro 'sya jīvasyāsad api sthitaṃ /
GSP27motik_2u:4530: sad ivāsyāṃ jagadrūpasampattau vyaktim āgatam // Mo_2,19.22 //
GSP27motik_2u:4541: nanu punar api kiṃ tasya jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ naśyaty atha vā nety |
GSP27motik_2u:4542: atrāha svayam eva vicāras tu sanañarthaṃ svakaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4543: nāśayitvā karoty āśu pratyakṣaṃ paramaṃ padam // Mo_2,19.23 //
GSP27motik_2u:4551: punar api jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ naśyatīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,19.23 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4552: nanu vicāraḥ kathaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ pratyakṣīkarotīty apekṣāyām āha vicārayan vicāro 'pi nātmānam adhigacchati /
GSP27motik_2u:4553: yadā tadā nirullekhaṃ param evāvaśiṣyate {14} // Mo_2,19.24 //
GSP27motik_2u:4564: nanu puruṣa {16} etasyām avasthāyāṃ buddhīndriyakarmāṇi karoti na vety |
GSP27motik_2u:4565: atrāha manasy anīhite śānte tair buddhīndriyakarmabhiḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4566: neha kaiścit kṛtair artho nākṛtair apy abhāvanāt // Mo_2,19.25 //
GSP27motik_2u:4580: atrāha manasy anīhite śānte na pravartanta eva te /
GSP27motik_2u:4583: kā vārtā tatkarmaṇāṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP27motik_2u:4585: na hi sarvadā te atraiva tiṣṭhanti |
GSP27motik_2u:4586: videhamuktās tu sarvadā etanmayā evety {20} alaṃ bahunā || MoT_2,19.26 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4593: vedanarūpavicāraśāntyaiva manaḥśāntir bhaviṣyatīty abhiprāyeṇāha manoyantrasya calane kāraṇaṃ vedanaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4594: prāṇālī dārumeṣasya {21} rajjur antargatā yathā // Mo_2,19.27 //
GSP27motik_2u:4611: vedanakṣobhena manasaḥ kṣobhe sati jagat kuto niryātīty |
GSP27motik_2u:4613: vidyate vedanasyāntar vāte 'ntaḥ spandanaṃ yathā // Mo_2,19.28 //
GSP27motik_2u:4617: nanu svabhāvataḥ śuddhasya vedanasyāntaḥ katham etad astīty |
GSP27motik_2u:4621: ata eva "sarvātmavedanam yathodeti tadātmakaṃ bhāti" sphurati |
GSP27motik_2u:4622: na tu tanmadhye malam iva jagad astīti bhāvaḥ |
GSP27motik_2u:4631: punaḥ punaḥ ślokāntareṇa {23} tad eva pratipādayati
GSP27motik_2u:4632: draṣṭaiva dṛśyatābhāsaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ /

GSP27motik_2u:4638: | tasya draṣṭuḥ "svaṃ rūpaṃ yathā bhāti" sphurati |
GSP27motik_2u:4645: sarvam ātmā yathā yatra saṃkalpatvam ivāgataḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4646: tiṣṭhaty āśu tathā tatra tadrūpa iva rājate // Mo_2,19.31 //
GSP27motik_2u:4648: ataḥ sa ātmā "yatra yathā tiṣṭhati tatra tathā tadrūpa iva rājate" |
GSP27motik_2u:4659: draṣṭṛtvaṃ {27} draṣṭṛsadbhāve dṛśyasya tv asti {28} nāsataḥ //
GSP27motik_2u:4663: paramārthatas tu na yujyate draṣṭṛtvād apracyuter
GSP27motik_2u:4674: phalitaṃ kathayati akāraṇakam evāto brahmakalpam idaṃ sthitam /
GSP27motik_2u:4675: pratyakṣam eva nirmātṛ tasyāṃśās tv anupādhayaḥ // Mo_2,19.33 //
GSP27motik_2u:4676: "ataḥ akāraṇakam" paramārthataḥ śuddhasya brahmaṇaḥ akartṛkatvāt kāraṇarahitam |
GSP27motik_2u:4686: nanu mā bhavatu brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ mātṛtvaṃ {33} vā |
GSP27motik_2u:4698: evaṃ prāsaṅgitvaṃ parityajya prakṛtam evānusarati svayatnamātretararūpako yas tad daivaśabdārtham apāsya dūre /
GSP27motik_2u:4699: śūreṇa sādho padam uttamaṃ tat svapauruṣeṇaiva hi labhyate 'ntaḥ // Mo_2,19.34 //
GSP27motik_2u:4707: sargāntaślokena vicārāvadhiṃ kathayati vicārayācāryaparamparāṇāṃ matena satyena sitena tāvat
GSP27motik_2u:4708: yāvad viśuddhāṃ svayam eva buddhām anantarūpāṃ paratām upaiṣi // Mo_2,19.35 //
GSP27motik_2u:4724: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe ekonaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ || mumukṣor vyavahāraṃ saṃgṛhya kathayati āryasaṃgamayuktyādau prajñāṃ vṛddhiṃ nayed balāt /
GSP27motik_2u:4731: nanu mahāpuruṣaguṇair vinā mahāpuruṣatā kathaṃ sidhyatīty {1} apekṣāyāṃ tadguṇāharaṇam eva kartavyatvena kathayati yo yo yena guṇeneha puruṣaḥ pravirājate /
GSP27motik_2u:4732: śikṣeta taṃ tam evāśu tasmād buddhivivṛddhaye // Mo_2,20.2 //
GSP27motik_2u:4735: anyathā buddhivṛddhyabhāve kathaṃ paraguṇagrahaṇasāmarthyaṃ syāt || MoT_2,20.2 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4738: nanu tarhi guṇagrahaṇaṃ suṣamam eveti {2} mahāpuruṣatāpi susādhyaiva syād
GSP27motik_2u:4739: | ity atrāha mahāpuruṣatā tv eṣā śamādiguṇaśālinī /
GSP27motik_2u:4740: samyagjñānaṃ vinā rāma siddhim eti na kasyacit // Mo_2,20.3 //
GSP27motik_2u:4741: ataḥ "samyagjñānam" evāryasaṃgamayuktyā prathamaṃ sādhyam iti bhāvaḥ ||
GSP27motik_2u:4745: atrāha jñānāc chamādayo yānti vṛddhiṃ satpuruṣakramāt /
GSP27motik_2u:4746: ślāghanīyāḥ phalenāntar vṛṣṭer iva navāṅkurāḥ // Mo_2,20.4 //
GSP27motik_2u:4753: nanu śamādibhir api kiṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha śamādibhyo guṇebhyaś ca vardhate jñānam uttamam
GSP27motik_2u:4756: phalitam āha guṇāḥ śamādayo jñānāc chamādibhyas tathā jñatā /
GSP27motik_2u:4765: punar apy etad eva kathayati jñānaṃ satpuruṣācārāj jñānāt satpuruṣakramaḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4768: nanu jñānaśamayoḥ saṃpattau puruṣasya kena yatnenottamapadaprāptir bhavatīty |
GSP27motik_2u:4769: atra sadṛṣṭāntam uttaraṃ kathayati yathā kamalarakṣiṇyā gītyā vitatatārayā {4} /
GSP27motik_2u:4772: tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam // Mo_2,20.9 //
GSP27motik_2u:4779: mṛgāṇāṃ {7} hi ayaṃ svabhāva eṣa yat gītiṃ śrutvā bhakṣyam api tyajantīti |
GSP27motik_2u:4780: tathā kartrā nāhaṃ karteti niścayāt kartṛtvaleparahitena "kartṛrūpiṇā" kartṛvad bhāsamāneneti yāvat |
GSP27motik_2u:4792: anyathecchārūpasya kṣobhasya sthitatvāt pūrṇatā na syād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,20.8-9 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4798: mumukṣuvyavahāraprakaraṇābhidheyaṃ vastūpasaṃharati sadācārakramaḥ prokto mayaiṣa raghunandana
GSP27motik_2u:4801: nanv adhunā kiṃ karoṣīty apekṣāyām āha |
GSP27motik_2u:4806: prakaraṇamāhātmyaṃ kathayati idaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradam /
GSP27motik_2u:4807: tajjñād āptātmaśāstrārthāc chrotavyaṃ kila dhīmatā // Mo_2,20.11 //
GSP27motik_2u:4818: atrāha śrutvā tu buddhinairmalyād balād yāsyasi satpadam /
GSP27motik_2u:4819: yathā katakasaṃśleṣāt prasādam avaśam payaḥ // Mo_2,20.12 //
GSP27motik_2u:4828: nanu katham etacchravaṇena puruṣaḥ {8} satpadaṃ yātīty |
GSP27motik_2u:4829: atra sargāntaślokenottaraṃ kathayati viditavedyam idaṃ hi mano mune {9}
GSP27motik_2u:4830: vivaśam eva hi yāti {10} paraṃ padam /
GSP27motik_2u:4831: yad avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamaṃ tad avabodhadaśāṃ na jahāti hi // Mo_2,20.13 //
GSP27motik_2u:4835: manaḥ vivaśam eva paraṃ padaṃ yāti" |
GSP27motik_2u:4836: ato viditavedyatvakāriṇaḥ etacchāstraśravaṇāt satpadaprāptir {11} yuktaiveti bhāvaḥ |
GSP27motik_2u:4837: nanu viditavedyam api manaḥ yadi kadācid viditavedyatāṃ {12} jahāti tadā kiṃ
GSP27motik_2u:4849: viditavedyo hi kadācid api viditavedyatāṃ "na jahātī"ti tātparyam |
GSP27motik_2u:4850: iti śivaṃ śivaṃ śivam iti || MoT_2,20.13 ||
GSP27motik_2u:4857: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe viṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 2,20
